g.text: the type of SOC and becomes perfect for the SOC with equal
Rashba and Dresselhaus parameters, where the TAHC vanishes
for a certain magnetization orientation. The TAHC changes
sign with ferroelectric polarization reversal providing a new
functionality of FTJs. We hope that our findings will stimulate
experimental studies of the TAHE in FTJs.
